title: Any thoughts or news on the harpseeker ward skin?

replies.body: It'll be out a bit later in patch 6.3. ^-^

I'd reckon you'd release the valentines stuff on Friday in preparation for the weekend, but I could be wrong.

I just hope it's soon. I NEEEEEEEEEEEEED Sweetheart Sona.

I actually don't know the date off hand, so this'll be a surprise for me. :P I am so excited for Sweetheart Sona. I primarily use Arcade 'cause that's what I've used since the skin came out, so the particles feel right. I worked on Sweetheart, and the particles are badass, sooo I may be finding a new favorite Sona skin to use. :o

Since I started playing a lot more Sona in recent times I went from having Arcade Sona which I've had for years to having Guqin, DJ and Silent Night Sona, and I tend to switch between them on the fly. I'll probably end up playing as Sweetheart Sona for a while before I go back to switching, because of just how great it is. 

Also since you worked on this skin, I have to say thank you and thank you to your team for making Sweetheart Sona a reality!

I will play Silent Night Sona, but only if I have a Reindeer Kog'Maw to carol with. :3 

I'm so glad you like her! She's one of my favorite skins I've worked on - the particles are what really make the skin for me. AND HER HARP ETWAHL. :D

One thing I really like is the recall, if only because there's something funny to me about using it to BM. Double kill in bot lane and Sona just blows a kiss as she heads back to base, almost like she's saying "thanks for feeding nerds" :3
Hahaha. I love Heartseeker Orianna's recall 'cause you can pull out a cake and taunt your enemies with it. :3

I like to imagine that's how she seeks hearts. She offers stuff, mainly cake, in exchange for hearts so she may understand what the sod they are.

"I'll give you cake, if you give me your heart."
"Well that sounds good, de-AHGHAAAAAHGAHGSHAGHBCLHJBSCJLHAB"
*Orianna rips out the fellow's heart right from their chest*
"Thank you valentine."
*proceeds to drop the cake on them and walk away*
I saw this awesome theory that since Orianna is a Heartseeker, she's literally out for blood and trying to take someone's heart, haha.
Thanks Katey!  The ward will fit my name well.  {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
